  labels = {["static"]}>
Given an extract element instruction with constant index operand, shuffle the source vector (shift the scalar element) to a NewIndex for extraction.

Return null if the input can be constant folded, so that we are not creating unnecessary instructions.

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the source operand of a potentially bitcasted value. If there is no</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to more accurately represent &quot;(new) SrcPtr - Offset = (old) SrcPtr&quot;, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// negation does not change the result of the alignment calculation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>.getZExtValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Original pattern: insertelt undef, load &#91;free casts of&#93; PtrOp, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the greater of the alignment on the load or its source pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  Alignment = std::max(SrcPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a47f5c74e1b14ba4a61db057400644acc">getPointerAlignment</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>), Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Optionally, we are shuffling the loaded vector element(s) into place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the mask set everything but element 0 to undef to prevent poison from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagating from the extra loaded memory. This will also optionally</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine which, if any, of the inputs should be replaced by a shuffle</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PreferredExtractIndex = <a href="#a935a117ebc18605ba99cdc14c80bdf0c">InvalidIndex</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Index0C = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Ext0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/extractelementinst/#aba9478635b356d769c5f10f92515d24b">getIndexOperand</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index0C &amp;&amp; Index1C &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected constant extract indexes&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index0 = Index0C-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index1 = Index1C-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the extract indexes are identical, no shuffle is needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index0 == Index1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = Ext0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/extractelementinst/#ab140abba7cc496d52d482be53d14ed6a">getVectorOperand</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VecTy == Ext1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/extractelementinst/#ab140abba7cc496d52d482be53d14ed6a">getVectorOperand</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Need matching types&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Cost0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(&#42;Ext0, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Cost1 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(&#42;Ext1, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both costs are invalid no shuffle is needed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Cost0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>() &amp;&amp; !Cost1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are extracting from 2 different indexes, so one operand must be shuffled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before performing a vector operation and/or extract. The more expensive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extract will be replaced by a shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cost0 &gt; Cost1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cost1 &gt; Cost0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the costs are equal and there is a preferred extract index, shuffle the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opposite operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PreferredExtractIndex == Index0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PreferredExtractIndex == Index1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, replace the extract with the higher index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index0 &gt; Index1 ? Ext0 : Ext1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get cost estimates for scalar and vector versions of the operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected a compare&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>).getPredicate();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get cost estimates for the extract elements. These costs will factor into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both sequences.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext0Index = Ext0IndexC-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ext1Index = Ext1IndexC-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Extract0Cost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(&#42;Ext0, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Ext0Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Extract1Cost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(&#42;Ext1, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Ext1Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A more expensive extract will always be replaced by a splat shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example, if Ext0 is more expensive:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opcode (extelt V0, Ext0), (ext V1, Ext1) --&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extelt (opcode (splat V0, Ext0), V1), Ext1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Evaluate whether that always results in lowest cost. Alternatively,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       check the cost of creating a broadcast shuffle and shuffling both</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       operands to element 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestExtIndex = Extract0Cost &gt; Extract1Cost ? Ext0Index : Ext1Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestInsIndex = Extract0Cost &gt; Extract1Cost ? Ext1Index : Ext0Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CheapExtractCost = std::min(Extract0Cost, Extract1Cost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extra uses of the extracts mean that we include those costs in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector total because those instructions will not be eliminated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OldCost, NewCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ext0Src == Ext1Src &amp;&amp; Ext0Index == Ext1Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle a special case. If the 2 extracts are identical, adjust the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// formulas to account for that. The extra use charge allows for either the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CSE&#39;d pattern or an unoptimized form with identical values:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opcode (extelt V, C), (extelt V, C) --&gt; extelt (opcode V, V), C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasUseTax = Ext0 == Ext1 ? !Ext0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a7c779ce2ba55bc94f52014fc25f3d520">hasNUses</a>(2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  : !Ext0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() || !Ext1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">    OldCost = CheapExtractCost + ScalarOpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewCost = VectorOpCost + CheapExtractCost + HasUseTax &#42; CheapExtractCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle the general case. Each extract is actually a different value:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opcode (extelt V0, C0), (extelt V1, C1) --&gt; extelt (opcode V0, V1), C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">    OldCost = Extract0Cost + Extract1Cost + ScalarOpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewCost = VectorOpCost + CheapExtractCost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">              !Ext0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() &#42; Extract0Cost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">              !Ext1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() &#42; Extract1Cost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  ConvertToShuffle = getShuffleExtract(Ext0, Ext1, PreferredExtractIndex);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ConvertToShuffle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsBinOp &amp;&amp; <a href="#ada5d6258a39686a00f3765392dd19aaf">DisableBinopExtractShuffle</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are extracting from 2 different indexes, then one operand must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shuffled before performing the vector operation. The shuffle mask is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// poison except for 1 lane that is being translated to the remaining</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extraction lane. Therefore, it is a splat shuffle. Ex:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ShufMask = &#123; poison, poison, 0, poison &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: The cost model has an option for a &quot;broadcast&quot; shuffle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       (splat-from-element-0), but no option for a more general splat.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;FixedVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int&gt;</a> ShuffleMask(FixedVecTy-&gt;getNumElements(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9965a6249be879ba3d336a75a4f3efa7">PoisonMaskElem</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShuffleMask&#91;BestInsIndex&#93; = BestExtIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewCost += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53eca7beec9815d0197f2d31fac9968e9205b">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;PermuteSingleSrc</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    VecTy, ShuffleMask, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    &#123;ConvertToShuffle&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewCost +=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53eca7beec9815d0197f2d31fac9968e9205b">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;PermuteSingleSrc</a>, VecTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">                             &#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &#123;ConvertToShuffle&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Aggressively form a vector op if the cost is equal because the transform</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may enable further optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Codegen can reverse this transform (scalarize) if it was not profitable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OldCost &lt; NewCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a shuffle that translates (shifts) 1 element from the input vector</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to a new element location.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523" lineLink="#a272e4181c033386bc62da6704be2d3e5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a272e4181c033386bc62da6704be2d3e5">createShiftShuffle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Vec, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OldIndex,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The shuffle mask is poison except for 1 lane that is being translated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the new element index. Example for OldIndex == 2 and NewIndex == 0:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ShufMask = &#123; 2, poison, poison, poison &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Vec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">  ShufMask&#91;NewIndex&#93; = OldIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore bogus insert/extract index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = VecTy-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index &gt;= NumElts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are inserting the negated element into the same lane that we extracted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from. This is equivalent to a select-shuffle that chooses all but the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// negated element from the destination vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>(NumElts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::iota(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>.end(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>&#91;Index&#93; = Index + NumElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OldCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the extract has one use, it will be eliminated, so count it in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original cost. If it has more than one use, ignore the cost because it will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be the same before/after.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Extract-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">    OldCost += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(&#42;Extract, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NeedLenChg = SrcVecTy-&gt;getNumElements() != NumElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the lengths of the two vectors are not equal,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we need to add a length-change vector. Add this cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;VecFNeg = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#adce7fec7d25956e70f6efc6eb903474d">CreateFNegFMF</a>(SrcVec, FNeg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewShuf = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(DestVec, LenChgShuf, Mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  replaceValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, &#42;NewShuf);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If this is a bitcast of a shuffle, try to bitcast the source vector to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="comment">/// destination type followed by shuffle. This can enable further transforms by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="comment">/// moving bitcasts or shuffles together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorCombine::foldBitcastShuffle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V0, &#42;V1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a99d8e67ed2343ad6717d7a8fdd3e7c7a">m&#95;BitCast</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5be13f3abb6bddf7ad9747b077da5a0e">m&#95;OneUse</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">                     <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5eee6cdb006c1d88b1123400f7f462d1">m&#95;Shuffle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(V0), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(V1), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/patternmatch/m-mask">m&#95;Mask</a>(Mask))))))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) Do not fold bitcast shuffle for scalable type. First, shuffle cost for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalable type is unknown; Second, we cannot reason if the narrowed shuffle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mask for scalable type is a splat or not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) Disallow non-vector casts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: We could allow any shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;DestTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SrcTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(V0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DestEltSize = DestTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcEltSize = SrcTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcTy-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits() % DestEltSize != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsUnary = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UndefValue&gt;</a>(V1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For binary shuffles, only fold bitcast(shuffle(X,Y))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if it won&#39;t increase the number of bitcasts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IsUnary) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BCTy0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1f4429b3a6cbf22cea042b77cf055f40">peekThroughBitcasts</a>(V0)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/tapifile-cpp/#a913a691648e20063bbd278e8f02d8430">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BCTy1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1f4429b3a6cbf22cea042b77cf055f40">peekThroughBitcasts</a>(V1)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/tapifile-cpp/#a913a691648e20063bbd278e8f02d8430">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!(BCTy0 &amp;&amp; BCTy0-&gt;getElementType() == DestTy-&gt;getElementType()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">        !(BCTy1 &amp;&amp; BCTy1-&gt;getElementType() == DestTy-&gt;getElementType()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 16&gt;</a> NewMask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DestEltSize &lt;= SrcEltSize) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bitcast is from wide to narrow/equal elements. The shuffle mask can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// always be expanded to the equivalent form choosing narrower elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcEltSize % DestEltSize == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected shuffle mask&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleFactor = SrcEltSize / DestEltSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa91449ed55cd3c525a3438252573527a">narrowShuffleMaskElts</a>(ScaleFactor, Mask, NewMask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bitcast is from narrow elements to wide elements. The shuffle mask</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// must choose consecutive elements to allow casting first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DestEltSize % SrcEltSize == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected shuffle mask&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleFactor = DestEltSize / SrcEltSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4373d3025961c2c2eeca56b02d7d009d">widenShuffleMaskElts</a>(ScaleFactor, Mask, NewMask))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bitcast the shuffle src - keep its original width but using the destination</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalar type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate cost of splatting both operands into vectors and the vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// intrinsic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(VPI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;FVTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitmaskenumdetail/#a4562904154aff9698a612bc7f6086a4c">Mask</a>.resize(FVTy-&gt;getNumElements(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> SplatCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(Instruction::InsertElement, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, 0) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecab1ac8982cdb119f39a5fe74610a46796">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;Broadcast</a>, VecTy, Mask,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate the cost of the VP Intrinsic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Type &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V : VPI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#ad027ea8803d83ee19b9a2e13aec6d655">args</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>.push&#95;back(V-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsiccostattributes">IntrinsicCostAttributes</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a47142a8413e4b403d01f9365ac8d7ff7">Attrs</a>(IntrID, VecTy, Args);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VectorOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getIntrinsicInstrCost(Attrs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OldCost = 2 &#42; SplatCost + VectorOpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine scalar opcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; FunctionalOpcode =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">      VPI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic/#afdf77acc5c4eeed0da64226ffeb5389f">getFunctionalOpcode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;Intrinsic::ID&gt; ScalarIntrID = std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FunctionalOpcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarIntrID = VPI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic/#a0041f4dfa269c9da654f0e1d020da6ef">getFunctionalIntrinsicID</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ScalarIntrID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate cost of scalarizing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarOpCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScalarIntrID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsiccostattributes">IntrinsicCostAttributes</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a47142a8413e4b403d01f9365ac8d7ff7">Attrs</a>(&#42;ScalarIntrID, VecTy-&gt;getScalarType(), Args);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getIntrinsicInstrCost(Attrs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(&#42;FunctionalOpcode,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              VecTy-&gt;getScalarType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The existing splats may be kept around if other instructions use them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostToKeepSplats =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">      (SplatCost &#42; !Op0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>()) + (SplatCost &#42; !Op1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> NewCost = ScalarOpCost + SplatCost + CostToKeepSplats;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Found a VP Intrinsic to scalarize: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; VPI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cost of Intrinsic: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; OldCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, Cost of scalarizing:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; NewCost &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to scalarize unless the vector variant actually has lower cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OldCost &lt; NewCost || !NewCost.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scalarize the intrinsic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(Op0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getElementCount();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;EVL = VPI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(3);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the VP op might introduce UB or poison, we can scalarize it provided</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we know the EVL &gt; 0: If the EVL is zero, then the original VP op</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// becomes a no-op and thus won&#39;t be UB, so make sure we don&#39;t introduce UB by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalarizing it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SafeToSpeculate;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScalarIntrID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">    SafeToSpeculate = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a89cda2218259523c41863fc1175d6907">Intrinsic::getAttributes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getContext(), &#42;ScalarIntrID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">                          .hasFnAttr(Attribute::AttrKind::Speculatable);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">    SafeToSpeculate = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5e36553611d3def8cf698c722239718f">isSafeToSpeculativelyExecuteWithOpcode</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;FunctionalOpcode, &amp;VPI, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;AC, &amp;DT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SafeToSpeculate &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal">      !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9893e3e4b14f8fa15d7c3c25a6a0b6f6">isKnownNonZero</a>(EVL, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery">SimplifyQuery</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, &amp;DT, &amp;AC, &amp;VPI)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ScalarVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">      ScalarIntrID</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal">          ? Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a80eec4efbded89b11092babf42a65b82">CreateIntrinsic</a>(VecTy-&gt;getScalarType(), &#42;ScalarIntrID,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    &#123;ScalarOp0, ScalarOp1&#125;)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal">  replaceValue(VPI, &#42;Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a40ed7274ff11f079e5b5eae34c818c51">CreateVectorSplat</a>(EC, ScalarVal));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not convert the vector condition of a vector select into a scalar</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// condition. That may cause problems for codegen because of differences in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// boolean formats and register-file transfers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Can we account for that in the cost model?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsCmp = Pred != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba07aee43ffb66908a25c55c77ce4c0d05">CmpInst::Predicate::BAD&#95;ICMP&#95;PREDICATE</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsCmp)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.users())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3ccd94f6a7507492b47c7351e3fb78c6">m&#95;Select</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>())))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsConst1 = !V1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IsConst0 &amp;&amp; !IsConst1 &amp;&amp; Index0 != Index1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a0bfbc695c285082c59ed77069aafbfae">I1</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
