<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Index = IsConst0 ? Index1 : Index0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ScalarTy = IsConst0 ? V1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>() : V0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VecTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal">         (IsConst0 || IsConst1 || V0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>() == V1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="normal">         (ScalarTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>() || ScalarTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#aac5759c83abd6a4af236401a7cfe7a0f">isFloatingPointTy</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">          ScalarTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a3b996fbf8458aafffc86cb98a68d0a47">isPointerTy</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected types for insert element into binop or cmp&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOpcode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarOpCost, VectorOpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsCmp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>).getPredicate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getCmpSelInstrCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">        Opcode, ScalarTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a0206e74dec02d952d1b620a7b63f5694">CmpInst::makeCmpResultType</a>(ScalarTy), Pred, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal">    VectorOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getCmpSelInstrCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">        Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a0206e74dec02d952d1b620a7b63f5694">CmpInst::makeCmpResultType</a>(VecTy), Pred, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(Opcode, ScalarTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">    VectorOpCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get cost estimate for the insert element. This cost will factor into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both sequences.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> InsertCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getVectorInstrCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">      Instruction::InsertElement, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> OldCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">      (IsConst0 ? 0 : InsertCost) + (IsConst1 ? 0 : InsertCost) + VectorOpCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> NewCost = ScalarOpCost + InsertCost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">                            (IsConst0 ? 0 : !Ins0-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() &#42; InsertCost) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">                            (IsConst1 ? 0 : !Ins1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>() &#42; InsertCost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to scalarize unless the vector variant actually has lower cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OldCost &lt; NewCost || !NewCost.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vec&#95;op (inselt VecC0, V0, Index), (inselt VecC1, V1, Index) --&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inselt NewVecC, (scalar&#95;op V0, V1), Index</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsCmp)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++NumScalarCmp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++NumScalarBO;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For constant cases, extract the scalar element, this should constant fold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsConst0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">    V0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr/#a078455f9a6da73bc84f24700a81d19d7">ConstantExpr::getExtractElement</a>(VecC0, Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73f286a780fbb8c82c0a8574540719ea">getInt64</a>(Index));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsConst1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">    V1 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr/#a078455f9a6da73bc84f24700a81d19d7">ConstantExpr::getExtractElement</a>(VecC1, Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73f286a780fbb8c82c0a8574540719ea">getInt64</a>(Index));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/ptxldstinstcode/#a91119cbee2be000c528a690252aee07ca09c68d67f7dbfa6cc77eaf73aa535217">Scalar</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">      IsCmp ? Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a843d43d070f0b1c6a133403edce488ef">CreateCmp</a>(Pred, V0, V1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOpcode(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The proposed vector pattern is:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vcmp = cmp Pred X, VecC</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ext (binop vNi1 vcmp, (shuffle vcmp, Index1)), Index0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CheapIndex = ConvertToShuf == Ext0 ? Index1 : Index0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExpensiveIndex = ConvertToShuf == Ext0 ? Index0 : Index1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> ShufMask(VecTy-&gt;getNumElements(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9965a6249be879ba3d336a75a4f3efa7">PoisonMaskElem</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">  ShufMask&#91;CheapIndex&#93; = ExpensiveIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">  NewCost += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getShuffleCost(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53eca7beec9815d0197f2d31fac9968e9205b">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;PermuteSingleSrc</a>, CmpTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt;= M &amp;&amp; M &lt; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + NumSrcElts)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><Highlight kind="normal">          M = InnerMask&#91;M - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><Highlight kind="normal">          M = 0 &lt;= M ? M + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> : M;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ShuffleDstTy || !CastDstTy || !CastSrcTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSrcElts = CastSrcTy-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDstElts = CastDstTy-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NumDstElts == NumSrcElts || Opcode == Instruction::BitCast) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Only bitcasts expected to alter src/dst element counts&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for bitcasting of unscalable vector types.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// e.g. &lt;32 x i40&gt; -&gt; &lt;40 x i32&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumDstElts != NumSrcElts &amp;&amp; (NumSrcElts % NumDstElts) != 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal">      (NumDstElts % NumSrcElts) != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 16&gt;</a> NewMask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumSrcElts &gt;= NumDstElts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bitcast is from wide to narrow/equal elements. The shuffle mask can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// always be expanded to the equivalent form choosing narrower elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumSrcElts % NumDstElts == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected shuffle mask&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleFactor = NumSrcElts / NumDstElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa91449ed55cd3c525a3438252573527a">narrowShuffleMaskElts</a>(ScaleFactor, OldMask, NewMask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bitcast is from narrow elements to wide elements. The shuffle mask</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// must choose consecutive elements to allow casting first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumDstElts % NumSrcElts == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected shuffle mask&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleFactor = NumDstElts / NumSrcElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4373d3025961c2c2eeca56b02d7d009d">widenShuffleMaskElts</a>(ScaleFactor, OldMask, NewMask))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">  Y1 = Match1 ? Y1 : OuterV1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ShuffleDstTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Match0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This method looks for groups of shuffles acting on binops, of the form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><Highlight kind="comment">///  %x = shuffle ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"><Highlight kind="comment">///  %y = shuffle ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><Highlight kind="comment">///  %a = binop %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><Highlight kind="comment">///  %b = binop %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672"><Highlight kind="comment">///  shuffle %a, %b, selectmask</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We may, especially if the shuffle is wider than legal, be able to convert</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the shuffle to a form where only parts of a and b need to be computed. On</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><Highlight kind="comment">/// architectures with no obvious &quot;select&quot; shuffle, this can reduce the total</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"><Highlight kind="comment">/// number of operations if the target reports them as cheaper.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorCombine::foldSelectShuffle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FromReduction) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2741"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each of the output shuffles, we try to sort all the first vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2742"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements to the beginning, followed by the second array elements at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2743"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end. If the binops are legalized to smaller vectors, this may reduce total</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2744"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of binops. We compute the ReconstructMask mask needed to convert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For reductions, we know that the lane ordering out doesn&#39;t alter the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2811"><Highlight kind="normal">    OrigReconstructMasks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(std::move(ReconstructMask));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2812"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2813"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the Maximum element used from V1 and V2 are not larger than the new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2815"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors, the vectors are already packes and performing the optimization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2816"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// again will likely not help any further. This also prevents us from getting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2817"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stuck in a cycle in case the costs do not also rule it out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2988"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2989"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if instruction depends on ZExt and this ZExt can be moved after the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2990"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instruction. Move ZExt if it is profitable. For example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2991"><Highlight kind="comment">///     logic(zext(x),y) -&gt; zext(logic(x,trunc(y)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2992"><Highlight kind="comment">///     lshr((zext(x),y) -&gt; zext(lshr(x,trunc(y)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2993"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Cost model calculations takes into account if zext(x) has other users and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2994"><Highlight kind="comment">/// whether it can be propagated through them too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2995"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorCombine::shrinkType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2996"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ZExted, &#42;OtherOperand;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate costs of leaving current IR as it is and moving ZExt operation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3023"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// later, along with adding truncates if needed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ZExtCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getCastInstrCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CurrentCost = ZExtCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ShrinkCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate total cost and check that we can propagate through all ZExt users</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : ZExtOperand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;UI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UI == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentCost +=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(UI-&gt;getOpcode(), BigTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShrinkCost +=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.getArithmeticInstrCost(UI-&gt;getOpcode(), SmallTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShrinkCost += ZExtCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a5c88132322ca3f46f242f7c023a57010">Instruction::isBinaryOp</a>(UI-&gt;getOpcode()))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3063"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the cost of shrinking types and leaving the IR is the same, we&#39;ll lean</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These folds should be beneficial regardless of when this pass is run</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the optimization pipeline.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The type checking is for run-time efficiency. We can avoid wasting time</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dispatching to folding functions if there&#39;s no chance of matching.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsFixedVectorType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::InsertElement:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3181"><Highlight kind="normal">        MadeChange |= vectorizeLoadInsert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3182"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3183"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::ShuffleVector:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3184"><Highlight kind="normal">        MadeChange |= widenSubvectorLoad(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3187"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3188"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3189"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This transform works with scalable and fixed vectors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
